00148 double EIG_PQG::lsfunc(double alpha){
00149 
00150    double ward = this->EIG_PQ::lsfunc(alpha);
00151 
00152    for(int i = 0;i < n_ph;++i)
00153       ward += eig_ph[i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig_ph[i]);
00154 
00155    return ward;
00156 
00157 }

00162 double EIG_PQG::min(){
00163 
00164    double ward = this->EIG_PQ::min();
00165 
00166    if(ward > eig_ph[0])
00167       ward = eig_ph[0];
00168 
00169    return ward;
